game.title: AKA: 187
game.author: Anthony DeGrazia, Petur Rosantsson
game.description: You’re a cold blooded killer, out to seek unruly justice on the world. If you’re up to the task, why don’t you talk to one of our affiliates at your nearest phone booth?
game.instructions: WASD moves, Left Mouse Button shoots, E enters vehicle and answers phone, ESC shows controls.
